description: IRS subsection under which charities are exempt.

metadata.attribution: SOS - Secretary of State - Charities Program
metadata.description: IRS subsection under which charities are exempt. The Colorado office of the Secretary of State Division of Charity registers charitable organizations that solicit contributions in Colorado and their professional fundraisers. A charitable organization is a type of non-profit organization (NPO) that centers on philanthropic goals as well as social well-being (educational, religious, other activities serving the public interest or common good). Search for “sos-csi” for all other charities related datasets.

name: IRS Tax Exempt Subsections
